title: [BUG] Progress line duplicates when switching terminal tabs during streaming

logs.msg: User report: progress text appended to tool output line (e.g., '• list(.)ng... (11s · Esc to cancel)') in first request output
Likely caused by terminal focus change not triggering proper UI redraw. Need to investigate FocusGained/FocusLost events in events.rs and ensure full UI clear on focus change.
No focus handling implemented. Fix requires: 1) EnableFocusChange at startup, 2) Handle FocusGained event to force full UI redraw. Moderate complexity.
User thinks this may have been fixed by other TUI clearing fixes. Needs verification.
